name: SYNTHR
introduce: SYNTHR is a synthetic asset protocol that enables users to mint and trade on-chain derivatives of various financial assets using trustless financial contracts. The protocol uses the Global Debt Model to mint syAssets, which can then be used to interact with an entire ecosystem of modules to perform various functions such as access to capital-efficient multi-chain liquidity, slippage-free swaps, real and sustainable farming, and safe bridging.
